description.value:
Tools, from Parchment inks to codifiers to forge or duplicate official documents, cognomens, passes, and permits. Provides a +10 Bonus when used with Trade(Copyist) or Tech-Use to copy, forge, or fabricate such things. Good Craftsmanship provies +20, Best provides +30.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: 400 T
